title: The Neon Lawyer
description: Based on a true story.  THE MOST TRAGIC EVENT A PARENT CAN FACE…  As though something torn from her nightmares, Amanda Pierce loses her daughter in the most horrific way possible. With unbearable pain eating away at her every day, she decides to take the law into her own hands, and kills the man responsible.  THE CASE OF A LIFETIME...  Brigham Theodore has just graduated law school and, with a legal market saturated with lawyers, accepts a position in a firm run by less than upstanding citizens. Though probably a criminal himself, his boss trusts him to handle criminal cases early on.  And Brigham is given a case he cannot refuse. The murder of a murderer. Amanda Pierce seems meek and frail, not at all like the picture Brigham has in his head of what a murderer should look like. He finds himself obsessed with her case and agrees to defend her.  WITH TIME RUNNING OUT, BRIGHAM MUST MAKE A CHOICE…  The state has offered to spare Amanda Pierce's life if she pleads to the murder. If she chooses to fight, she will be facing the death penalty. The first woman in the state of Utah to do so.  Battling an experienced, aggressive prosecutor with every resource at his disposal, this case is a war Brigham isn't certain he can win. But with his client's life on the line, he has no choice but to fight…
author: Victor Methos
